name: Coffee & Cults: A Deep Dive Into Hollywood

episodes.title: The Return of Hollywood’s Sketchiest Cast (Crimes, Cults & Lies)
episodes.description:
Ashton Kutcher, Mila Kunis, Danny Masterson, Laura Prepon, Wilmer Valderrama & Topher Grace spent eight years starring in That 70’s Show, one of the most successful shows of the late 90’s and early 2000’s. The  popularity of the show launched the six cast members from unknown actors to Hollywood stars. The cast of That 70’s Show didn’t just enjoy success for eight years, they all went on to established Hollywood careers, appearing in other tv shows, movies, hosting shows, streaming shows, collaborations, developing large social media followings, developing business and alleged charitable endeavours. But after decades of success today, the majority of the That 70’s Show cast are more infamous than famous. Over the last few years the cast have disappeared from the spotlight, some taking a step back to avoid uncomfortable questions, some going into the Hollywood version of hiding, & some aren’t even allowed to step foot in their own home ever again, never mind Hollywood. But unfortunately it looks as though several of the that 70’s show cast are trying to force their way back into the limelight, no matter how much it costs. We’ll also be discussing Danny Masterson’s desperate attempts to try & escape his life sentence & the shattering of what remained of her personal life. Along with his and scientology's further legal battles, & how scientology is working around the clock and pouring a an absolute fortune into trying help him escape the consequences of his vile actions. So sit back, relax & let’s dive into the latest chaos, career destructions & desperate attempts of the formerly famous & the now infamous cast of That 70’s Show. THANK YOU so much for watching & let me know your thoughts in the comments!

episodes.title: The Sketchy Business of Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis (Thorn Is NOT What You Think)
episodes.description:
Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis have had successful television & film careers for over 25 years, starting their careers playing a fictional couple Michael Kelso & Jackie Burkhart respectively on That 70’s show. But after making it to the A List & making an absolute fortune, in September 2023, they experienced one of the most talked about downfalls in Hollywood history & all because of their own actions related to their That 70's Show co star & best friend, Danny Masterson. They thought their behaviour would remain secret & the public wouldn't find out. But what a lot of people don’t know about Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis is that there are a lot more extremely questionable actions that they HAVE kept covered up & secret for years, esp when it comes to the company that has spent almost two decades laundering Ashton & Mila's reputation, the charity Thorn, a charity that allegedly helps exploited children, well... that’s what Ashton & Mila claim anyway. But there is so MUCH MORE to Thorn than most people know, including strong personal & financial ties to Jeffrey Epstein, Harvey Weinstein, Danny Masteron & Sean Combs/ P Diddy, via Thorn's investments & Ashton Kutcher's friendships. There's also a LOT more to discuss with the plethora of other businesses Ashton Kutcher is involved with, a few successful, many bonfires of cash but all with questions surrounding them. Along with a deep dive into Thorn & Kutcher's other businesses, we'll also be diving into their allegedly failing expensive & extensive mega PR strategy, which they’ve been using to desperately try & claw back any shred of positive public opinion, & they've now become so desperate, they are doing things they swore they never would. So sit back, relax & let’s dive into the decay, the business & downfall of Hollywood’s most controversial  couples, Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis. THANK YOU so much for watching & let me know your thoughts in the comments!

episodes.title: Everything You DON'T Know About The Masterson Siblings (Scientology, Crimes & Lies)
episodes.description:
Danny Masterson became a star when he was cast as Steven Hyde on 
That 70’s Show alonside Mila Kunis as Jackie Burkhart , Laura Prepon as Donna Pinnicoti, Topher Grace as Eric Foreman, Ashton Kutcher as Michael Kelso & Wilmer Valderama as Fez. The following year, his younger brother Chris Masterson also was cast in a hit Fox show, Malcolm In The Middle. The Masterson brothers had massive fame over the next several years, with both of their shows wrapping in 2006. Not too long after their success, their younger half siblings Alanna Masterson & Jordan Masterson found fame also, starring in The Walking Dead & Last Man Standing respectively.  Today however, the Masterson siblings are famous for a very different reason, for being Scientologists & Danny's horrendous crimes. The Masterson's have been involved in everything from cheating, lies, diva behaviour to serious, disgusting crimes. In this video we’ll be discussing everything about their behaviour, scandals, controversies, behaviour, crimes & more. THANK YOU so much for watching & let me know your thoughts in the comments!

episodes.title: EVERYTHING You DON'T Know About Scientology's Hidden Celebrity Members
episodes.description:
Scientology has always made celebrities a priority, & for such a small religion, scientology does have a large amount of celebrity members. Everyone knows Tom Cruise & John Travolta are scientologists but what about the hidden and even secret members. Today many Hollywood scientologists hide their affiliation with the church, even lifelong members like Elisabeth Moss from the The Handmaid's Tale & Will & Jada Smith. There are also many celebrities who are connected to scientology, albeit not members, like Ashton Kutch & Mila Kunis. In today's video we'll be talking about all the hidden scientologists in Hollywood & some interesting things you might no know about these members. We’ll also be exploring the most famous celebrity members and alleged members of scientology, such as John Travolta, Danny Masterson, Laura Prepon, Chris Masterson, Juliette Lewis, Will & Jada Smith, Elisabeth Moss, plus ex-member like Leah Remini, Nicole Kidman, Katie Holmes, John Stamos & many more. We'll also cover the many attempts Tom Cruise has made to draw other celebrities in, like David & Victoria Beckham Brad Pitt & many others. So sit back relax and let’s dive in to the controversial, shocking and twisted world of the secret & hidden celebrity members of Scientology.

episodes.title: EVERYTHING You DON'T Know About Laura Prepon's Scientology 'Exit' & Cruel Divorce
episodes.description: Laura Prepon moved to Hollywood in 1998 for her first ever role as the quintessential girl next door Donna Piccioti on That 70’s Show. But while That 70’s Show made Laura Prepon rich & famous beyond her dreams, it also introduced her to someone who brought a lot of darkness into her life, Danny Masterson. Laura Prepon & the rest of the That 70’s Show cast with the exception of Topher Grace became extremely close with Masterson, & also saw him as their cliques leader, but Laura Prepon & Danny Masterson’s relationship was much deeper than most of her costars. Through their friendship, Danny Masterson introduced Laura Prepon to the three biggest relationships of her life. Danny Masterson set Laura Prepon up with his brother Chris Masterson who has his own alleged dark history & when things didn’t work out with Chris Masterson, Danny Masterson was also the one who introduced Laura Prepon to her ex-husband and father of her children Ben Foster. Danny Masterson is of course also responsible for introducing Laura Prepon to the controversial Church of Scientology. Laura Prepon was a very active member of the alleged cult for decades, but within weeks of Danny Masterson’s arrest for multiple horrendous crimes, Laura Prepon claimed she was no longer an active scientologist. Laura Prepon refused to speak about her & her husbands still close ties to Danny Masterson, her exit from scientology or her alleged intimidation of dm’s victims. Given Laura Prepon’s silence on the subjects, some people thought op’s silence meant she was distancing herself from dm, while many more came to the conclusion she maintained a friendship with dm but just not publicly. After Danny Masterson’s sentencing in sept 2023 conversation around Laura Prepon and dm’s relationship died down, but behind the scenes lp’s relationship with dm was allegedly causing issues in her marriage, but not for the reasons you might think, as her now ex-husband ben foster is also a decade long friend of Danny Masterson's. Today we'll be covering everything about Laura Prepon, her 'exit' from scientology, her relationships with Chris Masterson & Ben Foster, her career & her messy divorce. episodes.title: How Diddy Helped Make J Lo A Music Star & Bought Her Silence
episodes.description: Diddy & Jennifer Lopez were an item back in the late 1990's and early 2000's and during their relationship the both went through huge life altering moments. During their relationship Diddy helped J Lo break into the music scene and become a star. At the same time, Diddy & J Lo were involved in a sho*oting at Club New York just prior to New Years 1999. Both J Lo & Diddy were arrested & evidence & accusations stacked up, although surprisingly after a ling trial, Diddy walked away completely exonerated. This event went on to create headline after headline, & despite Combs was charged with serious crimes, J Lo remained loyal and by his side. J Lo has kept the details of that night a secret, & a lot of mystery remains around it still to this day, which is why we’ll be taking a closer look at what really happened, because there is SO much more to the story of how Jennifer Lopez gained her enormous music career, her relationship with Combs & her career in present day. It seems as though after decades of rudeness, poor treatment of others & horrendous behaviour, J Lo's past, actions & behaviour has finally caught up to her. episodes.title: The Celebrities, Lies & Crimes That Built The Cult of Scientology (Allegedly)
episodes.description:
Tom Cruise is the most famous member of the alleged cult of Scientology & Scientologists believe he is saving the world. Many former Scientologists have accused the Church of Scientology of horrendous actions & countless ex-members have spoken out about what they went through to escape the controversial church. One aspect many people find fascinating is the amount of celebrity members. The founder of Scientology L. Ron Hubbard but a great deal of importance on attracting celebrities, even launching a Project Celebrity to recruit more famous faces. So who are these scientologists, and alleged scientologists? That's what we're going to be discussing in today's video. we’ll be diving in to the history of tom cruise and his involvement with the church, all of his relationships and the unbelievable ways they had to extract themselves from cruise and scientologys clutches, with some not being as lucky as others. I will even be sharing my own many dealings with cruise and the hundreds of scientologists he would bring with him at the times I was dealing with him. We’ll also be exploring the other celebrity members and alleged members of scientology, such as John Travolta, Danny Masterson, Laura Prepon, Chris Masterson, Juliette Lewis, Will & Jada Smith, Elisabeth Moss, plus ex-member like Leah Remini, Nicole Kidman, Katie Holmes, John Stamos & many more. We'll also cover the many attempts Tom Cruise has made to draw other celebrities in, like David & Victoria Beckham, Jim Carrey & Brad Pitt & what was said in the celebrity recruitment meetings. So sit back relax and let’s dive in to the controversial, shocking and twisted world of tom cruise and scientology.

episodes.title: The Crimes, Cheating & Lies That Built Diddy & Ashton's Hollywood Rat Pack
episodes.description:
Diddy & Ashton Kutcher have been friends for over 20 years, & after Diddy's arrest, it seems Ashton Kutcher & his wife Mila Kunis are trying to distance themselves from any association with Diddy. Especially after the disaster filled year they just had after writing letters of support for convicted serial monster Danny Masterson. In the early 2000’s, Diddy was already an a-lister, & while working on his hit show Making the Band with MTV, he met Hollywoods latest golden boy who also had a successful MTV show, Ashton Kutcher. Sean Combs & Ashton Kutcher created a fabricated story for how they met at MTV, but later in the video we’ll discuss the alleged real story, as this encounter with Diddy would set up over 20 years of friendship & showed P Diddy that Ashton Kutcher, supported by his best friend Danny Masterson could keep a secret. Combs & Kutcher connected immediately, & Diddy enjoyed spending time with Kutcher so much, he started inviting him to do everything friends would do together & much more. 

INTRO: 00:00-00:01 00:02-03:04
PART ONE: WHO ARE THE RAT PACK IN PRESENT DAY (CRIMES. ALLEGATIONS & LIES): 03:05-59:08
PART TWO: THE RAT PACKS HOLLYWOOD HEY DAYS: 59:09-01:47:23

In 2003 Combs also hit it off with Kutcher’s best friend Danny Masterson & combined with Kutcher and Mastersons fellow That 70’s Show costar, Wilmer Valderrama, Diddy formed a group with the three That 70’s Show stars & put himself at the centre, P Diddy dubbed them the new Hollywood rat pack.  In this video we'll discuss everything from the foundation of Diddy & Kutcher's relationship, their partying rat pack, business endeavours and their connections in present day. THANK YOU so much for watching & let me know your thoughts in the comments!

episodes.title: EVERYTHING You Don’t Know About The Twin Flames CULT (Forced Transitions, New Humans & Apocalypses)
episodes.description:
Twin Flames Universe is a cult lead by Jeff and Shaleia Divine (previously Jeff and Shaleia Ayan & many other names). They've been accused of brain washing, coercion, not paying people who work for them, forcing people to transition, telling their followers to stalk and harass their 'twin flame' & even telling people to violate restraining orders. Jeff and Shaleia are earning millions of dollars from their followers and all of the controversies surrounding them have caused the media to investigate their activity, journalists at Vanity Fair, Vice, and several others have dove into Jeff and Shaleia and Twin Flames Universe. In recent months, there has also been two docuseries released, Netflix's Escaping Twin Flames Universe & Amazon Prime's Desperately Seeking Soulmate - Escaping Twin Flames Universe. So today we'll be going over everything to do with Twin Flames Universe & the controversy surrounding Jeff and Shaleia - alleged coercion, brain washing, forced transition, not paying their workers, attempting to move all the followers to a privately purchased plot of land with hundreds of arches and so many other things. 
NOTE: This video is the result of research and everything is alleged and based on my personal opinion.

01:31:35-01:34:48 Conclusion 

Sister Wives is currently one of the most sucessful reality shows on television, and for 18 seasons viewers have follow the lives of Kody, Meri, Janelle, Christine, & Robyn Brown and their 18 children. In the early seasons of the show, the Browns tried to convince their audience that polygamy worked and that they were leading happy lives. Fast forward to today, and that premise has come crashing down, with three out of the four marriages failing and Kody barely speaking to any of his children. There's a lot of drama with Sister Wives, but also a lot of questionable behaviour, from predatory MLM's, money problems, the injuries and incidents that have happened to the kids on the show and just the all around awful behaviour by Kody Brown. Today we're going to be diving in to EVERYTHING you need to know about not only the Sister Wives show, but also the lives of Kody, Meri, Christine, Janelle and Robyn Brown outside of the show. I am also sitting down with some of the most beloved Sister Wives content creators towards the end of the video, so make sure you stick around for that! Thanks so much for watching!

episodes.description:
Timestamps

01:04:29-01:36:40 Chapter Five - Sentencing &Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis Letter Backlash
01:36:41-01:47:25 Chapter Six - Aftermath, Civil Trial, Divorce & SP Declaration

Danny Masterson has been a stable on television for the last 25 years, from That 70's Show to Men at Work to The Ranch, most people are aware of who he is. He is also is best friends with his That 70's Show costars, Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis. Masterson may look to be another typical Hollywood celebrity, but behind the scenes he was attacking a large amount of women, many more than you’ve heard about in the mainstream media. Danny Masterson, along with his siblings Chris Masterson (Malcolm in the Middle) & Alanna Masterson (The Walking Dead), is a lifelong member of the Church of Scientology. This case has had a lot of publicity because of the celebrities attached to it but unless you have been following this trial day after day from the people who were in court and following it all extremely closely, I think you’ll be surprised by what really went on. The investigation took over seven years, and Leah Remini even put out a special episode of Leah Remini: Scientology & the Aftermath, covering Masterson's attacks on multiple women. This video will go over everything about Masterson, the accusations, trial, outcome, aftermath and more. Let me know your thoughts in the comments and a huge thank you to @GrowingUpInScientology who attended the Danny Masterson trial everyday and provided live updates throughout the trial.
